com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.sessions.impl

Interface DocumentSessionComponentFactory<DocumentType extends Document>

  • Type Parameters:
    DocumentType - The type of the document you want to deal with.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OffsetBasedSessionComponentFactory

    public interface DocumentSessionComponentFactory<DocumentType extends Document>
    The DocumentSessionComponentFactory splits the implementation of a DocumentSession to useful chunks of functionality. You have to implement this class your own, but there are already many useful implementations of components existing. See: GuiFactory.markingNavigators() and GuiFactory.markings()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Markings createMarkings(DocumentType document, OffsetEditorView offsetEditorView) 
      MarkingNavigator createNavigator(OffsetEditorView offsetEditorView) 
      MarkingStore createStore() 

    • Method Detail

      • createNavigator

        MarkingNavigator createNavigator(OffsetEditorView offsetEditorView)
        Returns:
        A new MarkingNavigator implementing the navigation though the markings. You have to implement this interface if you want to support stepping through the flags in document. You might want to use an existing implementation via GuiFactory.markingNavigators(). If you do not want to implement you could return MarkingNavigatorsFactory.NULL().
        See: GuiControllerBuilder.withStepNext(), GuiControllerBuilder.withStepPrevious(), GuiControllerBuilder.withToggleStepThroughMode()

      • createStore

        MarkingStore createStore()
        Returns:
        A new MarkingStore storing and restoring the markings. You have to implement this if your integration should support show and hide markings. See: GuiControllerBuilder.withToggleMarkings(), MarkingStore.NULL

      • createMarkings

        Markings createMarkings(DocumentType document,
                      OffsetEditorView offsetEditorView)
        Parameters:
        document - the document
        Returns:
        A new Markings object, which manages the marking handling. This must be implemented, if you want to display the markings in the applications document. You might find helpful implementations in GuiFactory.markings().
        If you do not want to show markings at all you should return MarkingsFactory.NULL()
